ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle chile sauce

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature before mixing for smoother blending
Gently fold in the shrimp to preserve their texture and presentation
This dip can be served cold or warmed slightly in a slow cooker for entertaining
